summary: All four requested UI/layout requirements for PreMeditationPage (active-phase labels + padding/class removal; setup-phase guide moved to bottom; retire premed-slider-container styling) appear to be implemented per the diff summary. However, the diff also includes multiple unrelated styling/UI changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Play/pause button styling changes (larger size, enhanced borders/shadows/hover/active states) beyond the requested Volume/Time label and padding adjustments
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals restrict changes to layout/styling needed for labels and padding; play/pause button changes were not requested.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions .premed-play-pause-btn and play/pause button w-20 h-20 styling changes)
frontend/src/index.css (mentions themed play/pause button styling in summary)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (PreMeditationPage description mentions enhanced play/pause button size/styling)

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirement scope is limited to slider labels/padding and moving the setup guide container.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (PreMeditationPage description mentions lotus background with intensity 0.3)

hallucinated_features.description: Forcing single-column layout at all widths for setup content
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of moving the guide container; this is a broader layout change.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (PreMeditationPage description mentions single-column layout forced at all widths for setup content)

hallucinated_features.description: Passing a corrected prop name (selectedMusic) to AmbientMusicCarousel
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; this is a functional/wiring change unrelated to label/padding/guide ordering requirements.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (PreMeditationPage description mentions correct prop name (selectedMusic) passed to AmbientMusicCarousel)

hallucinated_features.description: Broad global CSS/theme changes (restored OKLCH token system, Playfair Display font, added/updated animations, scrollbar/notification styling)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; scope is limited to specific PreMeditationPage layout/styling changes for sliders and guide position.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (index.css description mentions restored OKLCH system, font, animations, scrollbar, notification styling)
